description: Tied to a chair with rope and blindfolded, Jonny Parker really is at Sebastian's mercy in this video. His uncut cock exposed, it's not long until Seb sets his sights on it after a sensual massage. He even ropes that part of him up too - not sure why he thinks it might escape - and then sets about bringing the hot, furry-legged beauty to orgasm.
title: Jonny Parker & Sebastian Kane
